notes: Spacious modern apartment with clean white tile floors in living areas and dark wood flooring in bedroom. Well-furnished with L-shaped sofa, dining set, TV console, and large wardrobe. AC units visible. Building has video intercom security system at entrance. For baby safety: coffee table has rounded corners which is good, but the balcony glass doors and low dresser drawers may need childproofing. Good natural light from large windows/balcony. Overall clean and well-maintained condition.
